about_the_game:
An island where multiverses meet! Dozens of different survivors on that island. You are one of them, those who wear the helmet. To survive, you need to play all your cards correctly. By the way, speaking of cards, we are talking about cards.

Create your deck, improve your cards by merging them, and defeat all your opponents. To be a survivor, don’t forget this; collect the best items you can find and upgrade them. Exciting duels await you on this island.

Download Deck Dash now and dash into a duel! Have fun for a long time with short-time battles. Shape your helmet bearer, create your war strategy, and choose your card wisely while building your deck and defeating your rivals. Download and dash into fun!

Features

  • - Epic Card Duels
  • - Competitive RPG Experience
  • - Flare Gun, Workbench, Crowbar, Rifle, or Pan! Dozens of weapons
  • - Unique helmet designs
  • - Melee, Firearm, and utility cards
  • - Play to win, not pay to win
  • - Collect and upgrade cards
  • - Different strategy in each turn
  • - Tons of card combination

Bearers of the Helmet
Each character in Deck Dash has a different strategy and a unique playstyle. Some use snipers, some want to be closer. But everyone on this island has one thing in common, the helmets on their head! You can customize your player and challenge unique helmet bearers.

Turn the page!
Turn the pain into power. Turn your wounds into wisdom. Come on, it’s your turn! Develop your strategy every turn, apply your tactics, beat your rivals, and have fun from turn to turn. Only you can turn your dreams into reality. Turn that faith upside down!

Put your hands up!
Dozens of different cards to create the best deck for you. There are different types of cards like melee, firearm, and utility. Turn your standard cards into legendary cards and strengthen your deck. Surviving on the island is in your hand, use your hand wisely on your way to victory.

Guns. Lots of guns!
A person who knows how to survive also knows how to use the resources in the best way possible. You have dozens of weapons and items in your hand. Hunting Rifle, Flare Gun, Boomerang, AK 47, Crowbar, Flintlock, or maybe corn! Do you think you are the best helmet bearer on the island? Don’t think you are. Know you are!

No escape from fun!
This is an island full of fun and excitement. Upgrade your cards, build your deck according to your war strategy, and have breathtaking duels with your rivals. Download Deck Dash now and dash into endless fun!

name: Deck Dash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 or higher
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 or higher
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
